pullrequest.title: Fetch a specific ssh key from portal

content.raw:
Good remark. 
Your observation is correct (for now), but it is a "hack". It certainly doesn't make sense for the docker use case.
I would prefer if cloudsim-sim server could download its ssh when starting up, if it finds an ssh route in its options.json.

We should see if we should fix these naive assumptions in this PR or keep it for the next one. This PR was written with the sasc use case in mind.
